name: Glow (itch) (Zylops)
description:
A path has been already laid out for you, you just have to follow it, seems easy, doesn't it?

A physics-based platformer with obstacles, and shiny crystals! 

Controls

  • Keyboard -  WASD

Objective

  • Activate the portal by collecting all crystals and go through it to the next level
  • Don't fall from the platforms
  • Don't get hit by a cannonball
  • Complete all levels
